content: “He’s a conspiracy theorist!” or some would say “nut job”. Isn’t saying that easier than researching a topic that raises many questions that ‘made’ people question it in the first place? In most cases these “nut jobs” might have a legitimate case and are actually intelligent people! I actually do believe this world is run by a group of elites (Rothschild, Rockefeller) and are responsible for all wars and poverty. Let’s hope people with the balls to speak out, keep speaking out and wake everyone up!!!
